meanings.definition: Toxins produced by certain bacteria that are released when the bacteria die and their cell walls break down.
meanings.sent1: The endotoxins from the bacteria can cause harm to the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of endotoxins on human health.
meanings.sent3: The endotoxins decided to have a party inside the body, but nobody was invited!
meanings.sent4: The endotoxins were like tiny, invisible bombs waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The endotoxins lurked in the shadows, ready to strike when least expected.
